ActJudges Act
SubjectEstelle Labrosse-Benoit ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Claude Benoit **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to ESTELLE LABROSSE-BENOIT, survivor of the Hon. Claude Benoit, a Judge of the Superior Court for the district of Montreal, in and for the Province of Quebec, effective February 13, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
